items.sentence: Tom found it difficult to answer the question.
Tom found it difficult to get along with Mary.
Tom gave Mary a quick kiss and got on the bus.
Tom gave us permission to use his beach house.
Tom got drunk and drowned while taking a bath.
Tom is tired of people telling him what to do.
Tom is too old to be doing this kind of thing.
Tom is willing to do almost anything for Mary.
Why are you protesting against the government?
Why in the world would I want to be a teacher?
Why would you ever want to do a job like that?
I wouldn\'t be here if Tom hadn\'t invited me.
He promised me that he wouldn\'t tell anybody.
Tom wasn\'t satisfied with the way I did that.
Tom wasn\'t the one who advised me to do this.
Tom wasn\'t the one who did that. It was Mary.
Tom wasn\'t the only one who thought that way.
Tom wasn\'t the only survivor of the massacre.
Does anybody want to take a walk to the beach?
Does this need to be kept in the refrigerator?
